subtitle: Workflow
intro: It generally consists of the following phases:
li-1: 1. Design: The customer's design is taken or done hand in hand with him.
li-2: 2. 2D Drawing: The necessary blueprints are made for the execution of the polygonal modeling.
li-4: 4. Rendering and post-production: Images are created from the 3D model. In this phase, the idea to be transmitted and the style of the project are taken into account.
